data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Perkins, Philip D. (2018): A new genus and new species of Meropathina from Lord Howe Island (Coleoptera: Hydraenidae). Zootaxa 4444 (4): 409-420, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4444.4.3|4 occurrences
